item.title: Illusionist Rework Please
item.dc:creator: Navi
item.description:
What about a slightly more simplified version: Mental Blur makes the target think they were occupied (ability still succeeds/fails normally), and all feedback they would receive is received by the Illusionist instead. Occupy immune players would still see their abilities feedback, but no other feedback (heals, attacks, etc.) and would see that somone tried to occupy them.

It would mean all occupation feedback would need to be changed to include mental blur though.

Mystic and Illusionist are now occupy immune (I believe?) so it could make butler a viable fake claim.

Read full topic
